test.name: CT02 - Visualizar Perfil Do Solicitante

kw.name: Iniciar Browser
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.
Abre o browser e configura parâmetros

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Iniciando CT02 - Visualizar Perfil Do Solicitante
kw.arg: Iniciando CT02 - Visualizar Perfil Do Solicitante
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Realizar Login Como Prestador
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

suite.doc: Testes automatizados para o sistema ChamuZé - Módulo Prestador de Serviços Cenários: Visualização/Aceitação de serviços, Visualização de solicitante e Envio de proposta
